comments.body:
I found two license files in the package. Why there are two?

One is BSD and the another one is MIT
Good question. I'm pretty certain MIT is the correct license and the BSD license is from a very old version and it never got removed. I'll double check, though.

I sent a PR, which has now been merged and a new release created, to fix this and clean up a couple other things. We'll see how the builds go but, I think, things should be in good shape now.

Thanks for all your help, @marcelotrevisani!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Coastline evolution model
  description: |
